lines.text: I hear, you, Seeker. Spit it out!
Okay, but seriously. The haywire in the ash pile, maybe?
Ugh. That wasn't even a joke. What about it?
Maybe... he got strangled with it?
And then the wire inexplicably ended up in a pile of ash? And then the wizard just sort of died somehow?
...Yeah, okay, I'm just throwing stuff at the wall and seeing what sticks.
Well, it didn't stick. Try harder.
